DOC.brief_summary: This register will evaluate the use of different antithrombotic therapies, combinations of different drugs routinely used during any stage of hospital admission, with their timing, dosage and mode of administration, in patients with a diagnosis of Acute Coronary Syndrome in the Italian Coronary Care Unit during a study period of three weeks
DOC.brief_title: EYESHOT (EmploYEd Antithrombotic Therapies in Patients With Acute Coronary Syndromes HOspitalized in iTalian Coronary Care Units)
